content.html: The attacks on Eddie Izzard really blows apart ‘Gender Critical’ claims not to be transphobic. Izzard hasn’t been particularly vocal on trans issues. She’s not competing on an All Women’s Shortlist. She’s literally just a trans person standing for public office. That’s it.
content.value:
The attacks on Eddie Izzard really blows apart ‘Gender Critical’ claims not to be transphobic.

Izzard hasn’t been particularly vocal on trans issues. She’s not competing on an All Women’s Shortlist. 

She’s literally just a trans person standing for public office. That’s it.
